isis.stitle: VT 365 Diesel Engine - 2004 Model Year - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT and BEARINGS, CAMSHAFT and BUSHINGS - Cleaning, Inspection, and Testing - Measuring Camshaft Bushings

svcproc.title: Measuring Camshaft Bushings
svcproc.para: Inspect the five camshaft bushings for wear and correct running clearance as follows:

figure.caption: Measurement for inner diameter of camshaft bushing

step1.para: Use a telescoping gauge and 2-3 inch micrometer to measure camshaft bushing inside diameters with bushings installed in crankcase.
To determine running clearance, subtract previous camshaft journal diameter readings from camshaft bushing inside diameter readings.
If maximum allowable running clearance is exceeded , replace camshaft bushings. See camshaft bushing removal and installation procedures in this section.
Inspect each bushing bore in crankcase for burrs or debris that could damage new bushings.
Remove burrs and clean bores thoroughly before installing new camshaft bushings.
